description: IIUC Computer Club is a approved Club in International Islamic University Chittagong (IIUC) founded in 2002. It is approved by Student Affairs Division (SAD) of IIUC. IIUC Computer Club is only the information technology based club in IIUC with a large number of members.
EEE Club (IIUC) is a approved Club in International Islamic University Chittagong (IIUC). It is approved by Student Affairs Division (SAD) of IIUC.
Pharma Club is a approved Club in International Islamic University Chittagong (IIUC). It is approved by Student Affairs Division (SAD) of IIUC.
Business Club is a approved Club in International Islamic University Chittagong (IIUC). It is approved by Student Affairs Division (SAD) of IIUC.
Law Club is a approved Club in International Islamic University Chittagong (IIUC). It is approved by Student Affairs Division (SAD) of IIUC.
Qur'anic Sciences Club is a approved Club in International Islamic University Chittagong (IIUC). It is approved by Student Affairs Division (SAD) of IIUC.

clubName: IEEE Computer Society IIUC Student Branch Chapter
description: IEEE CS is the trusted organization dedicated to engaging the engineers, scientists, academia, and industry professionals from across the globe driving continued advancements in computer science and technology.
